channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP ERP HCM Portugal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP ERP HCM Portugal

item.title: CVE-2021-42062|2024-08-04T03:22:25.846Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20erp%20hcm%20portugal
item.description: SAP ERP HCM Portugal does not perform necessary authorization checks for a report that reads the payroll data of employees in a certain area. Since the affected report only reads the payroll information, the attacker can neither modify any information nor cause availability impacts.
